channel.title: New And Recommended Titles at Reynolds Library
channel.description: RSS feed for new and recommended books, videos and more at J. Sargeant Reynolds Community College Library.

item.title: New Titles for June 2009

item.description: We're a little bit behind in reporting, but we've been adding some new titles. Click on the link to see a list; if you have any suggestions for new books, please suggest a purchase

item.title: New Titles for January 2009
item.description: Not only have we added several books the past couple months, we also have a few new popular videos. Click on the link to see a list; if you have any suggestions for new books, please suggest a purchase

item.title: New Titles for December
item.description: We're a little behind in posting this, so this list also includes most of January. Click on the link to see a list; if you have any suggestions for new books, please suggest a purchase

item.title: New Titles for October
item.description: The new books shown here are actually from July through October; with the move we're just now getting around to posting them!
